introduction_japanese: 筋肉は、運動やスポーツ、健康やトレーニング、体の仕組みを話すときによく出てくる言葉です。腕や足や腹など体の部位について説明するときによく使います。
introduction_english: The noun きんにく is commonly used in conversations about exercise, sports, fitness and training, and when talking about parts and functions of the body.
meanings: muscle (the anatomical tissue made of fibers)
muscle (one's muscular strength or physique; the state of having muscles)
meaning_explanation_japanese: 筋肉は、体を動かすための繊維状の組織のことです。力を出したり、体を支えたりする部分で、運動やトレーニングの話でよく使います。
meaning_explanation_english: The word きんにく means 'muscle'. It refers to the fiber-like tissue in the body that produces force and moves or supports the body, and it's often used when talking about exercise or training.

common_words: 筋道 (すじみち): logical order, reasoning
筋書き (すじがき): outline, plot
肉屋 (にくや): butcher, meat shop
肉体 (にくたい): the body, flesh

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means 'sinew' or 'fiber' and has the idea of a line or thread running through something. A common word is すじみち which means logical order and here the idea of a 'line' gives the sense of structure. Another common word is すじがき which means outline or plot and the kanji suggests the 'track' or main line of a story. The second kanji means 'meat' or 'flesh' and points to the body or edible meat. A common word is にくや which means meat shop and shows the concrete meaning of meat. Another common word is にくたい which means the physical body or flesh and uses the kanji to mean the body's flesh.
synonyms: 筋力 : きんりょく : muscular strength
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the 筋肉 are すじ and きんりょく. すじ is a shorter word that can mean tendon, sinew, or muscle tissue and is sometimes used informally. きんりょく refers to the strength produced by muscles rather than the muscle tissue itself.
antonyms: 脂肪 : しぼう : fat, adipose tissue
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the 筋肉 is しぼう. しぼう means fat, which is a different type of body tissue that stores energy instead of producing force like muscle.

collocations.kanji: しっかり筋肉を鍛える
collocations.furigana: しっかり筋肉を鍛える

collocations.kanji: 効率よく筋肉をつける
collocations.furigana: 効率よく筋肉をつける

collocations.kanji: 無理せず筋肉を増やす
collocations.furigana: 無理せず筋肉を増やす

example_sentences.furigana: 筋肉(きんにく)を鍛(きた)える。

translations.MY: ကြွက်သားများကိုတည်ဆောက်သည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 腕(うで)の筋肉(きんにく)が太(ふと)い。

translations.ID: Dia memiliki otot lengan yang tebal.
translations.ES: Tiene músculos gruesos en los brazos.
translations.VI: Anh ấy có cơ bắp tay to.
translations.FR: Il a des muscles des bras épais.
translations.TL: Siya ay may makapal na kalamnan sa braso.
translations.MY: သူ့တွင် ထူထဲသော လက်မောင်းကြွက်သားများရှိသည်။
translations.HI: उसकी बांह की मांसपेशियां मोटी हैं।

example_sentences.furigana: 筋肉痛(きんにくつう)を感(かん)じる。

translations.NE: मलाई मांसपेशी दुखेको महसुस भइरहेको छ।
translations.TL: Nararamdaman ko ang pananakit ng kalamnan.
translations.MY: ကြွက်သားတွေနာမယ်။
translations.HI: मुझे मांसपेशियों में दर्द महसूस हो रहा है।

example_sentences.furigana: 筋肉(きんにく)が疲(つか)れる。

translations.VI: Cơ bắp của tôi mỏi rồi.
translations.TL: Pagod na ang mga kalamnan ko.
translations.MY: ငါ့ကြွက်သားတွေ ပင်ပန်းတယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 筋肉(きんにく)の量(りょう)を測(はか)る。

translations.MY: ကြွက်သားထုထည်ကိုတိုင်းတာ။
translations.FA: توده عضلانی را اندازه گیری کنید.
